info.title: Setu { UPI Merchant Acquirer } APIs
info.description: APIs exposed to help merchants get onboarded onto the platform, create a payment context and collect payments from their customers

post.description: API to be used by an aggregator to setup a merchant on our platform

requestId.description: a unique id associated with a particular request

availabilityStatus.description: indicates if given vpa is available for use or not

merchantId.description: Id associated with the merchant on our platform

vpa.description: UPI id of the merchant to be used to collect payments

acceptDeemedTxns.description: Indicates whether deemed txns are to be accepted or not for the Merchant

businessName.description: Brand name or Consumer facing name

createdAt.description: RFC 3339 timestamp to indicate the creation date & time for the resource

id.description: Id of the resource, which is the same the id returned in the Create <resource> API response

legalName.description: Legal name as per incorporation documents

merchantName.example: Corporis eveniet deserunt voluptatibus aut ducimus.

settlementsEnabled.description: indicates whether settlements are enabled for merchant or not

transactionStatus.description: Current Transaction Status of the Merchant

amount.description: paise denominated value that needs to be collected from the user

closedAt.description: RFC 3339 timestamp to indicate the closure date & time

createdAt.description: RFC 3339 timestamp to indicate the creation date & time for the resource

customerVpa.description: UPI id of the customer to whom the collect request should be sent to

expireAfter.description: Expiry after (in minutes) for the collect request, the collect request will move to a closed state after this time has elapsed

id.description: Id of the resource, which is the same the id returned in the Create <resource> API response

merchantId.description: Id associated with the merchant on our platform

merchantVpa.description: UPI id of the merchant on which the payments are collected

metadata.description: field provided for the merchant to add additional key-value pairs

referenceId.description: Id to be used by merchant to identify the collect request on our platform, this can be the customer's invoice number or loan number

status.description: status defining the validity of the collect request

transactionNote.description: note displayed to the customer at the payment page

amount.description: Amount (in paise) that needs to be collected from the user. If populated this value gets displayed on the payer PSP's payment page

createdAt.description: RFC 3339 timestamp to indicate the creation date & time for the resource

expiryDate.description: RFC 3339 timestamp to indicate the expiry date & time
